item.title: 2. Installation & Configuration 문제풀이
item.description: 2. Installation & Configuration 문제풀이 # CKA # # 1. Deploy a pod named nginx-pod using the nginx:alpine image # Answer $ k run nginx-pod --image=nginx:alpine -o yaml > 1-1.yaml $ k apply -f 1-1.yaml $ k get pods NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE pod/nginx-pod 1/1 Running 0 59s 2. Deploy a messaging pod using the redis:alpine image with the labels set to tier=msg # Answer $ k run messaging --image=redis:alpine --labl=tier=msg -o yaml > 1-2.
